amendment.description: An amendment to require that lenders providing loans under this Act give priority to active duty members of the Armed Forces and to veterans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 111-594 to require that lenders providing loans under this Act give priority to active duty members of the Armed Forces and to veterans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCarthy (NY) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mrs. McCarthy (NY).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McCarthy (NY) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
